Introduction to Esports
Module 3: Expanding Career and College Opportunities

College Opportunities

More than 175 colleges now offer esports programs, with many more on the horizon. Groups like HSEL offer tournament prizes in the form of scholarships to help students pay for college. Because of this, esports at the high school level can motivate previously uninterested students to continue on to higher education. Participation in esports opens the door to over $15 million in scholarships every year.
